select pro_no, pro_name, v1_sy,v1_by , v1_by- v1_sy v1_zf , v2_sy,v2_by, v2_by- v2_sy v2_zf , v3_sy,v3_by, v3_by - v3_sy v3_zf, '201102' month_id from ( select b.pro_no, b.pro_name, sum(case when month_id = '201101' then a0001 end) v1_sy, sum(case when month_id = '201102' then a0001 end) v1_by, sum(case when month_id = '201101' then a0002 end) v2_sy, sum(case when month_id = '201102' then a0002 end) v2_by, sum(case when month_id = '201101' then a0003 end) v3_sy, sum(case when month_id = '201102' then a0003 end) v3_by from bi_demo.dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m2 t, dmcode_province b where t.prov_id = b.pro_no and month_id in ('201101','201102') group by b.pro_no, b.pro_name
) vcc
